Chapter 8 

     1-8. Example of Others an Inducement to Giving.--When a people have an earnest longing to help where help is needed in advancing the cause of God in any line, the Lord will impart to these consecrated, unselfish ones a heart to give gladly, as if it was a privilege. God moved on these Macedonians in their deep poverty to bestow 
                                                                           1103
liberally that their example might be recorded, thus leading others to exercise the same beneficence.
